item.description:
I'm still not super familiar with the trails here so we may not hit all the loops unless others know the way, but I've done it enough to know how to get a good hike in for about an hour or more (with backtracking). There's a nice place for the dogs to fetch in the water too.

Come explore with Beau and I as we try to dodge the N.E. bug season starting up! Definitely bring bug spray as there were mosquitoes here last week when we checked out the area, although they weren't as bad as at Musquash.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the parking area by the trail head. Dogs should probably be leashed at the beginning.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Salem Town Forest
